titles.title: I Will Sing the Wondrous Story

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I will sing the wondrous story Of the Christ who died for me, How He left His home in glory For the cross of Calvary.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Yes, I’ll sing the wondrous story Of the Christ who died for me, Sing it with the saints in glory, Gathered by the crystal sea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I was lost but Jesus found me, Found the sheep that went astray, Threw His loving arms around me, Drew me back into His way.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Days of darkness still come o’er me, Sorrow’s path I often tread, But the Savior still is with me; By His hand I’m safely led.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: He will keep me till the river Rolls its waters at my feet; Then He’ll bear me safely over, Where the loved ones I shall meet.
